nodes.text: The Kestel system was a star system located within the Mortex sector of the Outer Rim Territories region of the galaxy.

During the Galactic Civil War, the Kestel system was used by the Empire as a replenishment point. Sometime before the capture of the Black Ice, Imperial Replenishment Fleet DK-209 proceeded on hyperlane GH972 to rendezvous with Assault Fleet EM4.
